page.title: 15INTERESTS OF THE COMUNITY.
page.content: Wide range of clubs/societies are 58 residents belong to. 1 Coverdale Badminton Club. 2 British Cattle Society. 3 Country & Western Club. 4 Dales Spinners. 5 Coverdale Friendly Society. 6 Leyburn Discussion Group(Famers). 7 Richmond Musicial Society. 8 Sheep Breeders Society_Dalesbred & Teeswater. 9 Wenslsydale Dance Club. 10 Wensleydale Society. 11 Coverdale Womens Institute. From the above only ONE takes place within the survey area_ Badminton. With the exception of 5 & 11 which are held in Coverdale all others involve travelling by private car 8 to 40miles Sometimes the Dales Spinners hold meetings in the Dale at Swineside.
